DOC.brief_title: Electronic Brachytherapy ( eBx ) -Mohs Matched Pair - Cohort Study A Multi-Center Retrospective-Prospective Matched Pairs Cohort Study Assess Long-term Clinical Outcomes Non-melanoma Skin Cancer Patients Treated With eBx Compared Non-melanoma Skin Cancer Patients Treated With Mohs Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective-prospective study design . Patients complete treatment approximately 3 year ( range 2-4 year ) time IRB approval study identify exist data patient 's record collect addition conduct office visit long-term follow-up . The study include 2 part : 1 . Retrospective chart review : Collect data patient record complete treatment minimum 2 year prior study onset determine feasibility match pair cohort study comparison eBx versus Mohs surgery . The history , demographic treatment data retrospectively collect 320 subject previously treat eBx treatment NMSC 320 subject previously treat Mohs surgery treatment NMSC . 2 . Prospective Follow-up : Patients return long-term follow-up visit investigator assess lesion site , document absence recurrence/ absence recurrence , toxicity , collect patient report outcome .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Previously complete treatment nonmelanoma skin cancer use Xoft eBx Electronic Brachytherapy System Mohs surgery ; 2 . Provides informed Consent ; 3 . Greater 40 year age ; 4 . Pathological diagnosis confirm squamous cell basal cell carcinoma prior treatment ; 5 . Cancer Staging include study : Stage 0 : Tis , N0 , M0 Stage 1 : T1 , N0 , M0 Stage 2 : T2 , N0 , M0 â‰¤ 4cm diameter 1 . Target area adjacent burn scar 2 . Any prior definitive surgical resection cancer , prior Radiation Treatment 3 . Known perineural invasion 4 . Actinic Keratosis 5 . Known spread regional lymph node 6 . Known metastatic disease
